content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: quote: Originally posted by Woody_in_La: Does Sarah scare some of you so bad that you have to fixate on everything that happens to her or her family? Not scared at all. More along the lines of "highly amused." It's a bit like watching a train wreck combined with Barnum and Bailey's Circus. Everything Sarah Palin does ends up with some sort of dramatic contradiction of comedic proportions. I feel bad for Bristol. She's a young lady whose mother dragged her in front of the political arena, dragged her boyfriend along for the ride, and made a spectacle out of her, all while touting "abstinence only" sex-ed. For that matter, Sarah Palin was pregnant with her first kid before she got married, too... so I guess it runs in the family. Nobody would be making a big deal out of this if Sarah Palin herself hadn't pretended to be this pillar of Christian morality. This is about Sarah, her politics, her image, and her hypocrisy. Bristol has become an unfortunate casualty of her mother's career.

content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: Bristol Palin and her fiancé Levi Johnston have broken up, two sources tell FOX News. The split happened "a few weeks ago," according to a source close to the couple, but it's unclear what precipitated it. "It was a mutual thing," adds the source. Bristol, the 18-year-old daughter of Alaska Governor Sarah Palin, spoke with FOX News in February and told Greta Van Susteren that she and Levi – who are parents to 2-month-old son, Tripp – expected to get married after they completed high school. "It kind of just happened," says the source, referring to the split. "I thought they would stick it out. But I think they can work together to raise Tripp." "I'm not sure what caused [them to break up] – it's common knowledge," says another source who knows the family. Despite the breakup, Levi still sees the couple's son. Levi's dad, Keith Johnston, told PEOPLE recently that his son is a devoted and "proud father."

content: quote: Originally posted by navy8086: Or wait, I got it! She pizzed off the libs by NOT sucking her kid into a sink! Nobody has suggested that she should have aborted the pregnancy. I actually applaud her for taking the responsibility for her decisions. However, after all this rhetoric of "she's going to marry the baby's father and with a little hard work it will all be happily-ever-after, Christian-style," it's just interesting to see that it did indeed pan out as less pie-in-the-sky opinions predicted: the redneck loser boyfriend split, and reality came home to roost. I'm just appalled that Sarah Palin keeps dragging her daughter through the media. She kept parading Bristol (and the boyfriend) on stages across the nation during the campaign, and now it just doesn't stop. Poor Bristol. She doesn't need the hassle of an attention-hungry prima-donna mother in politics while she's busy trying to raise her own kid out of the media spotlight. As much as I find Sarah Palin to be the biggest joke of the political arena, Bristol is not a politician, and I say leave the kid alone.
